analysis.key_quote: Career civil servants have expertise and institutional memory. We do not need any more Pete Hegseths, incompetent appointees who owe their allegiance to their benefactor at the expense of the Constitution and our county.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to increasing political appointees and highlights the importance of career civil servants' expertise and institutional memory, indicating concerns about politicization and the potential loss of merit-based protections.
